price: 2. Motindami ayeli bango kowuta epai na Allah azali kotangela bango buku ya bopeto,
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
